1.0.name: wordpress/customizer-link
1.0.description:
Adds a "Customizer" link to the "Appearance" menu in WordPress. This is useful for providing a convenient go to place for your site admins to edit the design without having to go to the themes page.

The creation of this plugin was sponsored by the Norwegian Government Administration Services (G.A.S.) and Metronet.

More information can be found on the Customizer link plugin page.
